Class GameServer

java.lang.Object
Game.GameServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class GameServer extends Object implements Runnable
Class name: GameServer Methods list: start, main, run, showResults Constant list: N/A Purpose: GameServer class contains main method to start the server window and has static Player class
